original_text: If anyone tries to hurt them, fire comes out of the servants' mouths. This fire destroys their enemies. Anyone who wants to hurt the two servants must die in this way.
korean_text: 만일 누구든지 그들을 해하고자 하면 그들의 입에서 불이 나와서 그들의 원수를 삼켜 버릴 것이요 누구든지 그들을 해하고자 하면 반드시 그와 같이 죽임을 당하리라

sentences.original_text: If anyone tries to hurt them
fire comes out of the servants' mouths
Anyone who wants to hurt the two servants
